Sub: 
Installation of CCTV at all Hyper-sensitive airports. 
 
In terms of MCA letter no. AV-13024/27/2003-SS dated 13-07-2006 regarding 
the minutes of the meeting taken by MOS(CA) on 12-07-2006, AAI and the concerned 
Airport Operators shall take immediate necessary action to install/ improve coverage of 
CCTVs at all operational airports beginning with Hyper-sensitive airports within six 
months. They shall prepare design for installation/ improving coverage of CCTV and 
send it to the Specifications Committee for vetting. 
 
Specifications for the CCTV shall be communicated to all airport operators by 
BCAS by 30th August, 2006. 
 
 
(M. Malaviya) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
